entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, Harry Potter. He is described as having had worse experiences than his current situation.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who is grateful to Harry for setting him free and making him happier.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: A person mentioned as being responsible for Harry's detention.

entities.name: potions book
entities.description: A book that Harry is trying to finish an essay on.

entities.name: defence against the dark arts
entities.description: A subject that Harry and twenty-eight others want to practice without being discovered.

relationships.description: Dobby is grateful to Harry for setting him free.
